Profile Database Administrator 3, IT-Client Server Tech, FT, 8:30A-5P','69179','!*!The Database Administrator 3 should be skilled in the disciplines of database solutions analysis, planning, definition and business-technology strategy alignment and transformation. One of the key goals of this function is to lead and work with clients, Business Technology Consultants (BTC), and vendor partners in its pursuit of solution architecting, implementation and support, by leveraging industry models and frameworks formulating actionable strategies that intersect business and technology and accelerating implementation through established operations and processes. The Database Administrator 3 must possess demonstrated experience using technology to set and enable business goals planning execution, determining technical feasibility, cost of strategic options, and strategic possibilities enabled by existing and new technologies. The Database Administrator 3 will also provide support and mentoring for the lower tier Database Administrators and will assist in the creation of and adherence to BHSF IT methodologies and standards, i.e. project methodology, technology standards, systems and database architecture, etc. Rotational on call, 24X7 duties will be required.','!*!BS/BA degree in Information Technology field and a minimum of 3 to 5 years experience or equivalent combination of education and work experience as a Database Administrator. Advanced experience in the administration of Oracle and/or Microsoft SQL Server from installation and configuration to the logical and physical creation, support, and recovery of the database. Advanced knowledge of the database operating system platform such as UNIX and Microsoft Windows Server. Must have excellent customer focus with the ability to manage client expectations. Advanced project management experience required. Knowledge of health care environment is desirable. Advanced system design skills, verbal/written communication skills, documentation and inventory skills, organizational skills, solid analytical skills, decision-making skills, and team player attitude required. Occasional travel required. Must have transportation to be able to travel to all Baptist Health facilities. Rotational on call responsibilities will be required.','Corporate','Miami','','Corporate','Full-time','','Ongoing','','false','Database Administrator 3, IT-Client Server Tech, FT, 8:30A-5P Company info Baptist Health Systems of South Florida Website : http://www.baptisthealth.net
